sentences.sContent: Its action is very well for driver controling lade weight, deicing overload and keeping watch on the cargoes , ect.
sentences.sContent_eng: Its action is very well for driver controling lade weight, deicing overload and keeping watch on the cargoes , ect.
sentences.sCn: 对司机把握装载量，防止超载和监控货物等都有很好的作用。

sentences.sContent: Shipping company uses EDI agency to realize international information communication already, shipping proof and space plan or lade the plan can be transmitted through telecommunication.
sentences.sContent_eng: Shipping company uses EDI agency to realize international information communication already, shipping proof and space plan or lade the plan can be transmitted through telecommunication.
sentences.sCn: 航运企业早已使用EDI媒介来实现国际信息交流，装运证实和分隔计划或装载计划都可通过电信来传输。
